description: To mitigate the elevation of privilege issue associated with CVE-2023-36033, Microsoft has released several updates across impacted Windows builds. Users should apply KB5032190 for Windows 11 Version 23H2 and Windows 10 Version 22H2 on x64-based systems, as well as KB5032189 for Windows 10 Version 22H2 for 32-bit systems. For further enhancements, KB5032192 is recommended for Windows 11 Version 21H2. The updates can be accessed via the following links: [KB5032190](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190), [KB5032189](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032189), and [KB5032192](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192). Ensure that all systems reflect the latest build numbers to fully implement the fix and maintain optimal security.
